channel.description: give me everthing i need to know i will write one it will talk sometime i need to learn it all i wanr RegeX and all this i need the learn the lang i will print this when i wake up and i will read all in school thing about what i am going to do my plan is to make it change prxoy better i know you thing i am going crazy but i want to learn this and be better at java and RegeX lol i will tell you when i give up i was thing with just can use aryan and change where it connets to i think it gose to s3.runescape.com and i thing they change that to i will look in to it so help me you so if this happing again i know what to do.....plz this took forever to right and it will help you hack/bot/noob lol ok ty

item.title: Bot
item.dc:creator: @imafatmess imafatmess
item.description:
@imafatmess wrote:

nipplesandlicks:

give me everthing i need to know i will write one it will talk sometime i need to learn it all i wanr RegeX and all this i need the learn the lang i will print this when i wake up and i will read all in school thing about what i am going to do my plan is to make it change prxoy better i know you thing i am going crazy but i want to learn this and be better at java and RegeX lol i will tell you when i give up i was thing with just can use aryan and change where it connets to i think it gose to s3.runescape.com and i thing they change that to i will look in to it so help me you so if this happing again i know what to do…plz this took forever to right and it will help you hack/bot/noob lol ok ty

Hmmm…
You want to write a bot…

Why not just learn to teach a dog how to talk… That would be quite a bit easier…

You need so much java knowledge to even get close to writing a bot and understand it. It took me about 2-4 months to actually understand basic java scripting and to understand what objects were. With this new update you are definitely not going to find any tutorials or whatever to make the bot as it is so new…

It will just take ages for you to do it!

Come back in about 4 months time when you have got the hang of java then we will help then…

That ok???

Read full topic

item.title: Bot
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Pwnd:

That took forever to write? I could ramble on for as much as you did in no time at all. You know, snails are cool, you know? And, you’ll need a complete understanding of Java before you even try making a client with an auto-updater. You should learn the English language before any programming language. “give me everything i need to know;” so you mean, write the bot for you?

ownd. pwnd, i’m basically staying away from this board. It makes me feel stupid and illiterate

Read full topic
